extendedInfo.description: As seen on the Verizon commercialPlugin for the CAR LOCATOR appAUTOMATICALLY saves your location when you park by saving when your phone disconnects from your car's bluetooth or undocks from car dockMUST FIRST INSTALL CAR LOCATOREnable from within the Car Locator app. WILL NOT SHOW BY ITSELF

reviews.title: Not for your everybody
reviews.comment: Does not save the location 90% of the time. Tried contacting Tue developer and gave me a useless solution and ignored my replies after that.
reviews.author: William Sundy

reviews.comment: Pretty lame since takes too long to lock location. Well away from car by then.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bluetooth does not show up at all
reviews.comment: How do you enable bluetooth? It does not show up anywhere in the car locater app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I would like to move this application to my sd card. Please consider enabling this option in an update to the program.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s fine didn\'t have any problems yet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Seems to store location when i turn off the car and break the bluetooth connection, but car locator searches for car at previous location.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Purchased premium of app to use bluetooth function. 90% of the time it cant get my location or by the time it dose it leads me back to wrong place. Waist of money. And 15 min refund is a joke for an app like this. Save your money if your getting it for the bluetooth function. Needs alot of work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: One of only a few apps I\'ve uninstall. It\'s a waste of good memory
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really do NOT enjoy the on off on off of the Bluetooth the software causes to ny BMW\303\224
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: How about a option that if there is no GPS to not save the location and keep bugging me about GPS issues.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work... doesn\'t even show on my icons... droidx on the acura mdx... uninstalled
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: When I open the ap to find my car .....the ap saves my current location..and loses my car\'s. Truly useless!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very hit & miss; don\'t know if it\'s the phone bt or this app, but half the time it shows my car in the driveway while I\'m out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just do it manually
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work. Can\'t turn it on from within main app, and doesn\'t automatically work without my assistance.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: needs __dead reckoning__ feature like any good gps device. Parent app should also detect __WAIS__
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best one DROID x2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: OK App in general, but why
reviews.comment: do we have to install this module to use the Save on Undock feature?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome app if ur parked at the airport
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great up, responsive developer, well worth the money!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This plugin screws up attn request frm bluetooth unit.
reviews.author: A Google User
